Id: Revealed the structure of the citation network, highlighting critical nodes and knowledge‑transfer pathways.
Label: Revealed the structure of the citation network, highlighting critical nodes and knowledge‑transfer pathways.

Id: Demonstrated the utility of the proposed analytical model for patent and technology‑flow analysis in other technological areas.
Label: Demonstrated the utility of the proposed analytical model for patent and technology‑flow analysis in other technological areas.

Id: 47 trials with 4,824 participants were included.
Label: 47 trials with 4,824 participants were included.

Id: Xuezhikang had the highest probability of reducing total cholesterol (SUCRA 84.5%) and LDL‑C (SUCRA 82.6%).
Label: Xuezhikang had the highest probability of reducing total cholesterol (SUCRA 84.5%) and LDL‑C (SUCRA 82.6%).

Id: Zhibituo showed the highest probability of lowering triglycerides (SUCRA 80.2%) and increasing HDL‑C (SUCRA 90.1%).
Label: Zhibituo showed the highest probability of lowering triglycerides (SUCRA 80.2%) and increasing HDL‑C (SUCRA 90.1%).

Id: Simvastatin ranked second or third across most lipid parameters.
Label: Simvastatin ranked second or third across most lipid parameters.

Id: The included studies had limitations, indicating a need for more rigorously designed trials.
Label: The included studies had limitations, indicating a need for more rigorously designed trials.

Id: Closure and OAT appear to be equally effective in preventing recurrent stroke in PFO patients.
Label: Closure and OAT appear to be equally effective in preventing recurrent stroke in PFO patients.

Id: Closure is associated with a higher risk of atrial fibrillation.
Label: Closure is associated with a higher risk of atrial fibrillation.

Id: OAT is associated with a higher risk of bleeding.
Label: OAT is associated with a higher risk of bleeding.

Id: A randomized controlled trial is needed to determine optimal patient selection for each strategy.
Label: A randomized controlled trial is needed to determine optimal patient selection for each strategy.

Id: Smart‑logistics technology is in a growth stage with a continuous upward trend, confirming its status as a hot technology domain.
Label: Smart‑logistics technology is in a growth stage with a continuous upward trend, confirming its status as a hot technology domain.

Id: Six innovative logistics technologies are forecasted, aligning with national technology roadmaps and validating the approach.
Label: Six innovative logistics technologies are forecasted, aligning with national technology roadmaps and validating the approach.

Id: The findings provide actionable data for R&D strategies and technology‑roadmap development in the smart‑logistics sector.
Label: The findings provide actionable data for R&D strategies and technology‑roadmap development in the smart‑logistics sector.

Id: The anti‑software‑patent coalition was mobilized and gained control over key discourse frames.
Label: The anti‑software‑patent coalition was mobilized and gained control over key discourse frames.

Id: The pro‑software‑patent coalition, despite being well organized, failed to achieve sovereignty over the discourse.
Label: The pro‑software‑patent coalition, despite being well organized, failed to achieve sovereignty over the discourse.

Id: The Bayesian network–based method successfully captured meaningful technological associations among IPC codes.
Label: The Bayesian network–based method successfully captured meaningful technological associations among IPC codes.

Id: Performance verification on BMW-related patents demonstrated the effectiveness of the proposed approach.
Label: Performance verification on BMW-related patents demonstrated the effectiveness of the proposed approach.

Id: 30 RCTs involving seven oral Chinese patent medicines and 2602 patients were included.
Label: 30 RCTs involving seven oral Chinese patent medicines and 2602 patients were included.

Id: Bazhen granule + chemotherapy ranked highest for clinical efficacy and reduction of gastrointestinal reactions.
Label: Bazhen granule + chemotherapy ranked highest for clinical efficacy and reduction of gastrointestinal reactions.

Id: Cinobufacin capsule + chemotherapy was recommended as the priority for improving clinical efficacy.
Label: Cinobufacin capsule + chemotherapy was recommended as the priority for improving clinical efficacy.

Id: Xiao’aiping tablet + chemotherapy showed the best improvement in performance status and quality of life.
Label: Xiao’aiping tablet + chemotherapy showed the best improvement in performance status and quality of life.

Id: Zhenqi Fuzheng granule + chemotherapy was most effective in reducing leucopenia and had favorable safety profiles.
Label: Zhenqi Fuzheng granule + chemotherapy was most effective in reducing leucopenia and had favorable safety profiles.

Id: All 10 oral Chinese patent medicines combined with TACE showed superior effective rate, 1‑year and 2‑year survival, KPS improvement, and lower adverse‑reaction incidence versus TACE alone.
Label: All 10 oral Chinese patent medicines combined with TACE showed superior effective rate, 1‑year and 2‑year survival, KPS improvement, and lower adverse‑reaction incidence versus TACE alone.

Id: Ranking highlighted Shenyi Capsules, Cidan Capsules, Pingxiao Capsules, Huaier Granules, and Huisheng Oral Liquid as the most effective treatments.
Label: Ranking highlighted Shenyi Capsules, Cidan Capsules, Pingxiao Capsules, Huaier Granules, and Huisheng Oral Liquid as the most effective treatments.

Id: Overall evidence quality was low, indicating the need for high‑quality trials to confirm these findings.
Label: Overall evidence quality was low, indicating the need for high‑quality trials to confirm these findings.

Id: Solo inventors, especially unaffiliated ones, are less likely to achieve breakthroughs and more likely to produce very poor inventions.
Label: Solo inventors, especially unaffiliated ones, are less likely to achieve breakthroughs and more likely to produce very poor inventions.

Id: The collaboration effect exceeds a simple upward shift in the mean, influencing the distribution tails.
Label: The collaboration effect exceeds a simple upward shift in the mean, influencing the distribution tails.

Id: Experience diversity and external network size partially mediate the effect; diversity trims poor outcomes more strongly than it promotes breakthroughs.
Label: Experience diversity and external network size partially mediate the effect; diversity trims poor outcomes more strongly than it promotes breakthroughs.

Id: Identified core, highlighting, and emerging themes in gene‑editing technology.
Label: Identified core, highlighting, and emerging themes in gene‑editing technology.

Id: Found that development is constrained by ethical, legal, and cellular‑pollution concerns.
Label: Found that development is constrained by ethical, legal, and cellular‑pollution concerns.

Id: Suggested future research should focus on improving the safety and efficiency of gene‑editing technologies.
Label: Suggested future research should focus on improving the safety and efficiency of gene‑editing technologies.

Id: The largest subgroup exhibits clear small‑world network characteristics.
Label: The largest subgroup exhibits clear small‑world network characteristics.

Id: The overall network structure shows significant defects that hinder open innovation development.
Label: The overall network structure shows significant defects that hinder open innovation development.

Id: Strategic suggestions for promoting open innovation were proposed for policymakers and enterprises.
Label: Strategic suggestions for promoting open innovation were proposed for policymakers and enterprises.

Id: The WTE innovation network exhibits scale‑free characteristics, with few organizations connecting to many others.
Label: The WTE innovation network exhibits scale‑free characteristics, with few organizations connecting to many others.

Id: Major actors are early movers that continue to dominate technological trajectories.
Label: Major actors are early movers that continue to dominate technological trajectories.

Id: Collaboration patterns have shifted toward greater multidisciplinary involvement and larger technological distances, indicating a young industry with high regime dependence.
Label: Collaboration patterns have shifted toward greater multidisciplinary involvement and larger technological distances, indicating a young industry with high regime dependence.

Id: Jinshuibao capsule + ACEI/ARB achieved the highest total effective rate and significantly reduced 24‑h urinary protein, urine microalbumin, serum creatinine, and HbA1c.
Label: Jinshuibao capsule + ACEI/ARB achieved the highest total effective rate and significantly reduced 24‑h urinary protein, urine microalbumin, serum creatinine, and HbA1c.

Id: Huangkui capsule + ACEI/ARB showed superior reduction in blood urea nitrogen (BUN).
Label: Huangkui capsule + ACEI/ARB showed superior reduction in blood urea nitrogen (BUN).

Id: Bailing capsule + ACEI/ARB was associated with a lower incidence of adverse effects.
Label: Bailing capsule + ACEI/ARB was associated with a lower incidence of adverse effects.

Id: Applied the approach to the semiconductor industry and identified potential SME R&D partners for a large firm.
Label: Applied the approach to the semiconductor industry and identified potential SME R&D partners for a large firm.

Label: Demonstrated that the model provides a systematic, analytical method for forming effective large‑firm/SME partnerships.

Id: Strategic balancing of network position significantly enhances technical innovation performance and firm competitiveness.
Label: Strategic balancing of network position significantly enhances technical innovation performance and firm competitiveness.

Id: Empirical evidence confirms tacit knowledge recombination operates as a boundary‑spanning mechanism within joint‑patent networks.
Label: Empirical evidence confirms tacit knowledge recombination operates as a boundary‑spanning mechanism within joint‑patent networks.

Id: Identified the application trend, key technical hot spots, and leading organizations in the 5G domain.
Label: Identified the application trend, key technical hot spots, and leading organizations in the 5G domain.

Id: Revealed the structure, characteristics, and critical nodes of the citation network through topology analysis.
Label: Revealed the structure, characteristics, and critical nodes of the citation network through topology analysis.

Label: Demonstrated the flow of 5G technological knowledge among organizations using O‑I index analysis and provided a reusable analytical model for patent studies in other fields.

Id: Produced varied network representations of the patent set.
Label: Produced varied network representations of the patent set.

Id: Case study illustrates how the method reveals trends and stakeholders in 3D printing.
Label: Case study illustrates how the method reveals trends and stakeholders in 3D printing.

Id: Identified key technological knowledge areas and how different technological fields are connected and integrated.
Label: Identified key technological knowledge areas and how different technological fields are connected and integrated.

Id: Revealed dynamic evolution of technology networks over time, showing trends in generic technology development at a macroscopic level.
Label: Revealed dynamic evolution of technology networks over time, showing trends in generic technology development at a macroscopic level.

Id: Observed network changes that coincide with real‑world technological shifts.
Label: Observed network changes that coincide with real‑world technological shifts.

Id: The neural model performs comparably to a rule‑based expert system baseline.
Label: The neural model performs comparably to a rule‑based expert system baseline.

Id: It overcomes specific limitations of rule‑based and hybrid machine‑learning approaches.
Label: It overcomes specific limitations of rule‑based and hybrid machine‑learning approaches.

Id: Demonstrates a promising step toward computational retrosynthetic analysis.
Label: Demonstrates a promising step toward computational retrosynthetic analysis.

Id: Model improves the speed of patent search
Label: Model improves the speed of patent search

Id: Enables fast, accurate, and comprehensive retrieval of identical or equivalent patents
Label: Enables fast, accurate, and comprehensive retrieval of identical or equivalent patents

Id: Enhances efficiency and accuracy of patent infringement detection
Label: Enhances efficiency and accuracy of patent infringement detection

Id: Identified clear patterns in the dynamics of the patent citation network.
Label: Identified clear patterns in the dynamics of the patent citation network.

Id: Found the reinforcement learning ranking more suitable than classical PageRank.

Id: Recognized the need for further work to achieve detailed insights and predictive capability.
Label: Recognized the need for further work to achieve detailed insights and predictive capability.

Label: Two analytical frameworks (network and co‑classification) for assessing technological convergence are established.

Label: Two portfolio matrices are proposed to aid strategic management of converging technologies.

Id: The approaches enable measurement of convergence intensity, rate, and coverage using patent data.
Label: The approaches enable measurement of convergence intensity, rate, and coverage using patent data.

Label: 179 RCTs (16,789 patients) showed OCPM+WM superior to WM alone.

Id: QSYQ+WM achieved the highest probability for clinical effective rate (98.12%) and ECG improvement (94.21%).
Label: QSYQ+WM achieved the highest probability for clinical effective rate (98.12%) and ECG improvement (94.21%).

Id: Generated actionable insights for researchers, corporations, and market stakeholders.

Id: Demonstrated the method’s applicability across different technology fields.
Label: Demonstrated the method’s applicability across different technology fields.

Id: Patent centrality is negatively related to market value after accounting for citation counts, indicating extra informational content.
Label: Patent centrality is negatively related to market value after accounting for citation counts, indicating extra informational content.

Id: Patents in patent pools exhibit lower centrality, suggesting the measure can flag likely holdup or complementarity.
Label: Patents in patent pools exhibit lower centrality, suggesting the measure can flag likely holdup or complementarity.

Id: Citation‑based communities contain more information than traditional classifications and detect technological shifts earlier.
Label: Citation‑based communities contain more information than traditional classifications and detect technological shifts earlier.

Id: Ranked total effective rate for angina symptom improvement: Shenshao Capsules > Naoxintong Capsules > Ginkgo Ketone Ester Dripping Pills > Compound Danshen Dripping Pills > Ginkgo Leaf Tablets > Shexiang Baoxin Pills > Tongxinluo Capsules > Yindan Xinnaotong Soft Capsules.
Label: Ranked total effective rate for angina symptom improvement: Shenshao Capsules > Naoxintong Capsules > Ginkgo Ketone Ester Dripping Pills > Compound Danshen Dripping Pills > Ginkgo Leaf Tablets > Shexiang Baoxin Pills > Tongxinluo Capsules > Yindan Xinnaotong Soft Capsules.

Id: Ranked total effective rate for ECG curative effect: Ginkgo Ketone Ester Dripping Pills > Compound Danshen Dripping Pills > Tongxinluo Capsules > Shenshao Capsules > Shexiang Baoxin Pills > Yindan Xinnaotong Soft Capsules.
Label: Ranked total effective rate for ECG curative effect: Ginkgo Ketone Ester Dripping Pills > Compound Danshen Dripping Pills > Tongxinluo Capsules > Shenshao Capsules > Shexiang Baoxin Pills > Yindan Xinnaotong Soft Capsules.

Id: Chinese patent medicines combined with conventional therapy improve clinical efficacy of unstable angina, though findings require further verification due to variability in study quantity and quality.
Label: Chinese patent medicines combined with conventional therapy improve clinical efficacy of unstable angina, though findings require further verification due to variability in study quantity and quality.

Id: UCG showed the greatest improvement in urinary albumin excretion rate (UAER) (MD = ‑47, SUCRA = 98.0%).
Label: UCG showed the greatest improvement in urinary albumin excretion rate (UAER) (MD = ‑47, SUCRA = 98.0%).

Id: CXC achieved the highest overall response rate (ORR) (RR = 1.3, SUCRA = 91.9%).
Label: CXC achieved the highest overall response rate (ORR) (RR = 1.3, SUCRA = 91.9%).

Id: SSNT was superior for serum creatinine reduction (MD = ‑19, SUCRA = 99.3%) and had fewer adverse events (RR = 0.46, SUCRA = 82.9%).

Id: BLC most effectively reduced 24 h urinary total protein (MD = ‑170) and triglycerides (MD = ‑0.89).
Label: BLC most effectively reduced 24 h urinary total protein (MD = ‑170) and triglycerides (MD = ‑0.89).

Id: TG demonstrated the highest cost‑effectiveness (≈108 RMB per 3 months).
Label: TG demonstrated the highest cost‑effectiveness (≈108 RMB per 3 months).

Label: Offers a novel thinking mode for companies to evaluate patents from a dynamic development perspective.

Label: Enables a more rational assessment of patent value based on network position.

Id: Supports the construction of an early‑warning mechanism for potential patent litigation.
Label: Supports the construction of an early‑warning mechanism for potential patent litigation.

Id: Combined therapy (Chinese patent medicines + conventional treatment) showed greater efficacy than conventional treatment alone across all outcomes.
Label: Combined therapy (Chinese patent medicines + conventional treatment) showed greater efficacy than conventional treatment alone across all outcomes.

Id: Rankings: Dan'e Fukang Plaster > Xuefu Zhuyu Capsules > Gongliuxiao Capsules for VAS reduction; Xiaojin Capsules > Shaofu Zhuyu Granules > Dan'e Fukang Plaster for CA125 reduction; Gongliuxiao Capsules > Xiaojin Capsules > Sanjie Zhentong Capsules for E2 reduction; Guizhi Fuling Capsules > Xuefu Zhuyu Capsules > Dan'e Fukang Plaster for lowering recurrence.

Id: Due to low methodological quality of the included trials, large‑scale high‑quality RCTs are needed for confirmation.
Label: Due to low methodological quality of the included trials, large‑scale high‑quality RCTs are needed for confirmation.

Label: Structural features of the Polish patent co‑ownership network for 2011 were identified and described.

Label: The research procedure for constructing and analyzing the network was outlined.

Id: Most Chinese patent medicines combined with NBZDs were superior to NBZDs alone in effective rate, PSQI improvement, and safety, with specific top‑ranked regimens identified for each outcome.
Label: Most Chinese patent medicines combined with NBZDs were superior to NBZDs alone in effective rate, PSQI improvement, and safety, with specific top‑ranked regimens identified for each outcome.

Id: Combined therapy can effectively alleviate insomnia symptoms with high safety, but the conclusions are constrained by the low methodological quality of the included studies.
